attributes.action: Get the bus service in Inverness fixed
attributes.additional_details: The people of the Highlands are loosing their jobs, missing hospital appointments, college, the list is endless. Stagecoach say its driver shortage. To also get them to stop saying buses are coming and at last minute cancel them leaving people stuck.
attributes.background: Get the Highland Council to act on behalf of the people of Inverness against Stagecoach and their non existant bus service in Inverness, leaving people stranded and loosing their jobs because of unreliable service.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
